title: Apsara Kundan Long Haaram Set with Jhumka - Celestial Elegance
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Kundan settings. Features uncut diamonds (Polki diamonds) with exceptional brilliance
complemented by high-quality natural pearls. Accented with Ruby and Emerald gemstone cabochons. Finished with a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This exquisite Haaram features intricate peacock motifs and delicate floral patterns rendered in Kundan artistry. The cascading design culminates in a grand pendant, showcasing elaborate detailing and gem placement. The necklace is interspersed with perfectly round pearls that add a touch of classic charm. The Jhumka earrings echo the Haaram's design, ensuring a cohesive and regal look.
colors: Predominantly gold with brilliant diamond sparkle. Accented with the rich red of the ruby and the verdant green of the emerald. The pearls provide a soft
occasions: and grand celebrations. An ideal choice for Seemantham (బారసాల) or any traditional South Indian ceremony where a statement piece is desired. This set is equally suitable for high-profile parties and events
effortlessly blending traditional elegance with contemporary allure.
description: This Haaram set is a testament to timeless craftsmanship and unparalleled elegance. The intricate Kundan work, combined with the brilliance of uncut diamonds and the gentle shimmer of pearls, creates a truly captivating piece. It is a heirloom-quality set that embodies cultural heritage and adds a touch of regal sophistication to any ensemble. The Hyderabadi polish enhances its luster and durability.
